short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CouponBot automatically finds the best voucher codes, coupons, discounts, deals and promo codes as you shop online.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
To activate your CouponBot a.k.a your online shopping best friend, all you need to do is install this extension. Every time you shop online, it will sync the best suited coupon codes to save you money, time, and energy.
Online shopping and saving has never been this easy. Try it out!
